import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import io from"socket.io-client";import useUserData from"../useUserData";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const socket=io();const Chat=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const{usernickname,roomid,setUsernickname,setroomid,fetchUserData}=useUserData();const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const[chat,setChat]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchUserData();socket.on("receiveMessage",message=>{setChat(prevChat=>[...prevChat,message]);});return()=>{socket.off("receiveMessage");};},[]);useEffect(()=>{if(setroomid){console.log("Room ID: ".concat(setroomid));socket.emit("joinRoom",setroomid);}if(usernickname){console.log("User Nickname: ".concat(setUsernickname));}},[setroomid,setUsernickname]);const sendMessage=()=>{if(setroomid&&setUsernickname){socket.emit("sendMessage",{sender_id:setUsernickname,receiver_id:setroomid,content:message});setMessage("");// Clear message input after sending
}else{alert("Please join a room first and enter your User ID.");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:setUsernickname,placeholder:"Your User ID",disabled:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:setroomid,placeholder:"Room ID",disabled:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"chat",children:chat.map((msg,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[msg.sender_id,": ",msg.content]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:message,onChange:e=>setMessage(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter message"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:sendMessage,children:"Send"})]});};export default Chat;
